post.description: Create a new workspace for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve all workspaces for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response List Workspaces V1 Workspace All  Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific workspace, ensuring it belongs to the authenticated user.

patch.description: Update a workspace (only if owned by the authenticated user).

post.description: Create a new campaign (only in developer-accessible workspaces owned by the user).

get.description: Retrieve all campaigns for the authenticated user (developer-accessible workspaces they own).

schema.title: Response List Campaigns V1 Campaign All  Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific campaign, ensuring it's in a developer-accessible workspace owned by the user.

patch.description: Update a campaign (only if it belongs to a developer-accessible workspace owned by the user).

post.description: Send an instant message to one or multiple recipients.
Send a message to all contacts in a campaign.

get.description: Fetch all message logs for the authenticated user.
Retrieve all messages sent by the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Get User Messages V1 Message History Get

get.description: Retrieve all messages sent to a specific recipient.

schema.title: Response Get Messages By Recipient Endpoint V1 Message History Recipient  Recipient  Get

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific message.

post.description: Create a new developer app (optionally in a workspace owned by the user).

get.description: List all developer apps for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response List Developer Apps V1 Developer Apps All Get

get.description: Get a developer app by its ID.

get.summary: Get Developer App By Key Endpoint
get.description: Get a developer app by its app_key.
List all developer apps for a workspace (owned by the user).

schema.title: Response Get Workspace Developer Apps Endpoint V1 Developer Apps Workspaces  Workspace Id  Get
